references.paper_title: Dsgn: Deep stereo geometry network for 3d object detection
references.reason: This paper introduces the DSGN architecture, which serves as the foundation for the proposed StreamDSGN in this work.

references.paper_title: Dsgn++: Exploiting visual-spatial relation for stereo-based 3d detectors
references.reason: This paper presents DSGN++, an improved version of DSGN, which is used as the baseline detector in this work.

references.paper_title: Are we ready for autonomous driving? the kitti vision benchmark suite
references.reason: This paper introduces the KITTI dataset, which is used as the primary benchmark in the presented research to evaluate and compare the proposed method against state-of-the-art approaches.

references.paper_title: Real-time object detection for streaming perception
references.reason: This paper explores the concept of streaming perception and proposes the StreamYOLO framework, which provides a strong baseline in this work for the proposed enhancement.
